text.tspan: Urban improved water access vs. rural water access, 2015
The share of the urban population with access to improved water sources versus the share of the rural population
with improved water sources. The improved drinking water source includes piped water on premises (piped
household water connection located inside the user’s dwelling, plot or yard), and other improved drinking water
sources (public taps or standpipes, tube wells or boreholes, protected dug wells, protected springs, and rainwater
Improved water source, rural (% of rural population with access)
Improved water source, urban (% of urban population with access)
